column1: ="The side of a square is "&Q31&" cm long. What is its area?"
column3: The area of a square is the side length squared.

column3: The area of a square is the side length squared.

column1: ="The edge of a cube is "&Q33&" cm long. What is its volume?"
column3: The volume of a cube is the edge length cubed.
